column1: Helmingas was a name for the Rohirrim of the Westfold
column2: indicating the followers of and descendants of King Helm
column3: just as the name Eorlingas referred to the people of Rohan who came after Eorl.  On 4 March  during the Battle of the Hornburg
column4: when Orcs managed to penetrate the Deeping Wall
column6: "Helm! Helm! Forth Helmingas! " to rally the men of the Westfold to repel the invaders.
